A Primeira Revolução Industrial surgiu na Inglaterra no final do século XVIII início do século XIX, foi marcada principalmente pelo advento da máquina à vapor na indústria têxtil e locomotiva, nesse período a produção deixou de ser artesanal e passou a ser manufaturada e a produção passou a ser em larga escala.

A Segunda Revolução Industrial iniciou no final do século XIX, com a queda da hegemonia Inglesa que estava sendo substituída por outras nações como Alemanha e EUA, e prolongou até o século XX.

Os principais adventos desse período foram o descobrimento da eletricidade e o motor à combustão, gerando a indústria automobilística e as demais.

A Terceira Revolução Industrial teve início no final da década de 70, e mudou a configuração do sistema de produção, agora firmado na tecnologia, na robótica, na telecomunicação, essa foi denominada de Revolução Técnico-Científica.
Atualmente vivemos uma nova etapa no processo produtivo, devido à globalização conjuntamente como os meios de comunicação modernos e a competitividade, proporcionou um mercado exigente buscando profissionais com alto conhecimento. Esse período atual da sociedade é chamado de Revolução Técnico-Científico-Informacional.

The Entity, a supernatural being hailing from the ancient blood web, is awakened from its slumber and summoned by actions of great violence and malice. The killers, mostly serial murderers, or victims of terrible tragedy, are pulled out of reality by it and convinced or forced to do its bidding. In order to maintain its existence, the Entity requires sacrifices, and demands that they hunt and kill the survivors so it can feed off their hope and steal a piece of their souls upon death. In order to continue this hunt, the Entit blocks off the Gateways of death and puts the dead into a dreamlike state that leads the survivors back to The Entity's world to get hunted again.
The survivors are pulled into the Entity's constructed world when they wander too close to the places the killers were taken from, dissapearing from the real world without a trace. They end up at a lonely campfire, where they rest between trials, until a killer pursues them again. Each trial takes place in a series of realms constructed by the Entity of areas from where the killers were taken. The survivors' only hope of escape is to complete a series of generators scattered throughtout each realm to power up large gates to escape. If the killer has killed all but one survivor, the Entity will offer the latter a final means of escape in the form of a hatch. Escaping from the grounds always takes the survivors back to the campfire, and offerings can be created to be burnt at it and appeal for the Entity's favour. Since the Entity feeds off the hope of the survivors to escape, it helps them just as much as the killers, acting as impartial observer of the hunt, stepping in only to claim those hung on its hooks.

Very fun game, playing as both survivor and killer. The only 'cons' that I have found so far are that it takes awhile to find a lobby if you are playing killer and that you can only play bots in the tutorial (which doesn't give you the option to customize your killer/survivor).

I wanted to take time to really play and experience this game before i made a review. When you first start playing it will be the most fun you have ever had with a single game, then you will continually hate your existence more and more until you put the game down for a month or two. There are always new killers both licensed and OG. With fresh new content and the ever changing meta every time you take a break and come back to the game in a month or two it feels like a completely different game. So you start the vicious cycle over again. But no matter what the game is there. Chilling on the desktop waiting for you to fall back into the entity’s arms.

これから始めるならおすすめしません。
まず、面白そうなキャラは全て課金DLCです。

課金は慣れてきて面白ければでいい。そんなあなた！
まずもって、今から始めたからと言って同じような初心者と当たると思わないでください。
パーク（キャラにつけられる能力のようなもの）が1つしかないあなたに対して、他の4人はレベルマックスのパークが4つついています。
キラーをやりたいなら、まず勝てない前提でやりましょう。
サバイバーなら味方に強い人を引くのをひたすら祈りましょう。
（このゲームをフルパでやると面白味も何もなくなるし、キラーがかわいそうなのでやめましょう。）

1キャラのパークをフル装備するのに膨大な時間がかかります。
地獄のようなマッチを耐えて耐えて耐え抜けば楽しくなります、頑張ってください。

最後にもう1度言っておきます。絶対におすすめしません。

Simple overview of Dead by daylight:

Pros:
-Unique gameplay for both killer and survivor sides that is deeply enjoyable.
-Lots of killers to choose from or to encounter.
-Variety of builds with many perks, offerings and add-ons (for various in game buffs).
-Great customization for most survivors and some killers.
-Learning the game and getting better feels satisfying.
-Great horror experience for a casual player.
-Randomly generated maps, tiles and spawns means every game will be different.

Cons:
-Takes a very long time to learn both sides, even more so for each individual killer.
-Some maps favor one side over the other, making winning very difficult or very easy in some cases.
-Some killers are strong and some are weak, and at high elos the weak ones are less common.
-Some perks are considerably better than other alternatives and are used a lot because of this.
-Customization is somewhat limited on most killers.
-Negative players can ruin the experience and are common.
-Is trying to be a competitive game and it doesn't work.
-bugs bugs bugs.

Overall I'd give Dead by Daylight a 8/10; despite the many negatives, the positives more than make up for it. It doesn't really get old, and is an incredibly addicting game once you get into it. If some of the negatives were ironed out, it would easily be one of my favorites of all time.

ok i get that i've got 5 hours, but ive played a knock off for like a year before i got a new pc and am constantly getting matched with red ranks.  This is a good game.  A great game even.  The mechanics and challenge are fun and rewarding, and theres always room to improve.  This is, first and foremost, a multiplayer game.  If you have ping in the 200-300s, this might be a bit beyond your capabilities, at least to be able to enjoy.  I'm a killer main, so I can't really tell you what playing with friends is like.  Happy Hunting!
